page.title: 17MOULTON SCHOOLS
page.content: Moulton Primary School is in Church Hill Moulton. There are approxamatly 330 pupils between the ages of 4-11. The school consists of a head teacher, 12 teachers,a secretary,ancilleries,a caretaker, cleaners, a cook, kitchen staff and dining room supervisers. There are eleven class rooms,a hall and canteen. At the back of the school is a small playing field and a outdoor heated swimming pool. Moulton Comprehensive school is situated at Pound Lane Moulton. Moulton school is a six form entry, co-educational Comprehensive school with permanent accommodation for nine hundred pupils. The school was founded in 1954,becoming an 11-18 comprehensive in 1974. Also there is a college of Agriculture in Moulton.
